name: ROXIE MITCHELL WILLIAMS
motto: Vd rather be writing, but you don’t just ignore this kind of source material.
story: Roxie Mitthell Williams is an American writer and novelist, famous for BEYOND SUNSET, a horror novel set in American New England. The novel remoins near the top of the best-sellers list after four years, with dozens of re-printings. One wound how the public. wound react to the kniowledge:that the novel is based on actual events, and even somewhat toned down.
